text:
Hi <@U02227D27V3> Did I read your message correctly that we can use the CMS boilerplate? This is the instruction from the Practicum in the course:

Create a theme from scratch. (_note: in production situations we recommend using the boilerplate theme as a starting point, but this exercise is a test_).

I thought this meant we can't use any boilerplate, including CSS - did I understand wrong?

Yes, I have.

You have to provide the following:

old work email and old work HubSpot portal ID
new email and new HubSpot portal ID

without the portal ID from the old account they have no way to verify that you are in fact the same person.
